title: Biomarker candidate identification
questions: How to mine public databases to retrieve info?
How to build a selection strategy by applying successive biochemical/cellular criteria to a list of gene/protein?
How to select biomarkers candidates using experimental information (transcriptomics & proteomics) and annotation from public databases?
objectives: Build a workflow implementing a strategy for the selection of tissue-leakage biomarkers using ProteoRE
key_points: Public proteomics databases are useful resources for annotation of biomarker candidates

workflows.name: 'Biomarkers4Paris' Workflow
workflows.title: 'Biomarkers4Paris' Workflow

history.message: Add first version of biomarker selection tutorial
